import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaCheckCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import "./ResumeSection.css"; const ResumeSection = () => { const [openSection, setOpenSection] = useState(""); const toggleSection = (section) => { setOpenSection(openSection === section ? "" : section); }; return (

toggleSection("experience")}>

  • Manage materials procurement & KPI reporting
  • Weekly updates & client coordination
toggleSection("skills")}>

); }; export default ResumeSection;
